headline: How Shifting Wall Street Expectations Are Reshaping The Story Behind UDR’s Valuation
summary: UDR's latest valuation update nudges its fair value estimate slightly lower to about $40.43 per share from roughly $40.70, as analysts recalibrate expectations in light of softening apartment fundamentals and persistent capital allocation challenges for REITs. The model also reflects a modestly lower discount rate of around 7.35% versus 7.37% and a slight easing in anticipated revenue growth to roughly 2.45% from 2.46%. This captures a cautious but still constructive outlook as the sector...

headline: UDR, Inc. Declares Quarterly Dividends
summary: DENVER, December 18, 2025--UDR, Inc. (NYSE: UDR), a leading multifamily real estate investment trust, today announced that its Board of Directors declared a regular quarterly dividend on its common stock for the fourth quarter of 2025 in the amount of $0.43 per share, payable in cash on February 2, 2026 to UDR common stock shareholders of record as of January 12, 2026. The February 2, 2026 dividend will be the 213th consecutive quarterly dividend paid by the Company on its common stock.

headline: UDR, Inc. Announces $230 Million Joint Venture Expansion

(the "Company") (NYSE: UDR), a leading multifamily real estate investment trust, announced today that it has closed a $230 million expansion of its joint venture with LaSalle Investment Management (the "Partner"), increasing the size of the joint venture to approximately $850 million. headline: LaSalle Announces $230 Million Expansion of Joint Venture with UDR, Inc.
summary: LaSalle Investment Management ("LaSalle") announced today that it has closed on a $230 million expansion of its joint venture with UDR, Inc. (NYSE: UDR), a leading multifamily real estate investment trust. This transaction increases the total size of the joint venture to approximately $850 million.
